meanings.definition: The quality or state of being illimitable.
meanings.sent1: The illimitability of the ocean amazed the young explorer.
meanings.sent2: The concept of illimitability in space is mind-boggling.
meanings.sent3: The illimitability of the buffet left the guests in disbelief.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination knew no illimitability, reaching beyond the stars.
meanings.sent5: The illimitability of the desert stretched endlessly before them.

meanings.definition: The property of being limitless or boundless.
meanings.sent1: The illimitability of the sky on a clear day is breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: Exploring the illimitability of human potential is a fascinating journey.
meanings.sent3: The illimitability of the ice cream flavors made choosing just one difficult.
meanings.sent4: His love for her had an illimitability that knew no end.
meanings.sent5: The illimitability of the forest seemed to go on forever.
